entry.def: A caramel is a chewy sweet food made from sugar, butter, and milk.
Caramel is burnt sugar used for colouring and flavouring food.

means.word_mean: 1. firm chewy candy made from caramelized sugar and butter and milk
2. burnt sugar; used to color and flavor food
3. a medium to dark tan color
1. having the color of caramel; a moderate yellow-brown
